name: Lil BUB's 2014 "Best Year Ever" CALENDAR
description: Deadlines to receive your order by the holiday: Domestic: order by Wednesday December 18th International: order by Friday December 13th Please note our Mail Order offices will be closed December 23rd through January 2nd. _____________________________________ It's Lil BUB's "Best Year Ever" 2014 Calendar. This is a 13 month calendar (starts with December of this year!) featuring stunning photos. Each month is accompanied with words of clairvoyance and wisdom for the most amazing space cat on the planet - BUB. The calendar is 12" x 12" and printed on high quality stock. Designed by David J. Woodruff and Sons. Printed by our pals at Jakprints. A portion of all proceeds will be donated to these awesome organizations: Pets Alive The Exotic Feline Rescue Center Monroe County Humane Association The rest will go to the BUB emergency fund, part of which helps ensure that she always gets the best food money can buy. BUB thank you for your support! IMPORTANT INFO FROM OUR DISTRIBUTOR: All orders will ship within 3 business days unless one the items ordered happens to be out of stock. You will be notified if your item is back ordered with an estimated ship date. We strive to meet the demands of our customers by providing quality merchandise free of defect and to arrive as ordered. • For all inquiries, please contact us at returns@scdistribution.com. SC Distribution will gladly accept returns or exchanges within 30 days of original purchase. All return items must be unworn and unwashed. In order to process your return please include your name, email address, mailing address and order number along with the items that you're returning and why. You'll be responsible for the shipping charges associated with sending the return back to us. However, if you've received a defective item or an item you did not order, our service department will send a free shipping return tag along with the item that was intended to be ordered. Please ship the unwanted item back immediately upon receiving the new item.

name: Classic BUB Zip-Up Hoodies
description: Deadlines to receive your order by the holiday: Domestic: order by Wednesday December 18th International: order by Friday December 13th Please note our Mail Order offices will be closed December 23rd through January 2nd. _____________________________________ The "Classic BUB" Zip-Up Hoodies are printed here in the USA on black Tultex hoodies. The final shipped product will be very similar but may have slight differences. 8 oz. 80% ring-spun cotton/ 20% polyester, jersey lined hood with matching drawstring, zip-front with split muff pocket, ribbed cuffs and waistband with 5% spandex, #5 nickel cadmium zipper. name: Limited Edition Set of All 3 Official "Lil BUB and Friendz" Theatrical Posters
description: This is a Limited Edition set of three (3) different, full color, high-quality movie posters for Lil BUB and Friendz, a feature-length documentary by VICE Media. The "Pink" design is a giant theatrical-sized poster measuring 24" x 36" (that's 2' x 3' - it's big!), printed on a thick 12 pt glossy paper stock. The "Space" and "Jaws" designs are printed on 11" x 17" thick 12 pt glossy paper stock. The three posters cannot be purchased separately, and are a limited edition item. Once they sell out, that's it BUB! The posters are very large, and in order for them to arrive to you in good shape, they must be shipped in a big tube, and therefore are relatively expensive to ship. But, it's easy to fit other items in the tube. So if you order them with the Movie Magnets, enter BUBANDFRIENDZ as your discount code to get $5 off your whole order. If you order them with any other item(s), enter POSTERSHIP to get 5% off your entire order. Be sure to check out the "Lil BUB and Friendz" Movie Magnets HERE. If you order the posters AND the magnets, enter BUBANDFRIENDZ as your discount code to get $5 off the whole order. And then you can hang up your posters with your magnets. Hey guess what? You can watch the trailer for the movie HERE! As always, a portion of all proceeds will be donated to these awesome organizations: Pets Alive The Exotic Feline Rescue Center Monroe County Humane Association The rest will go to the BUB emergency fund, part of which helps ensure that she always gets the best food money can buy.
